Windows

History

  • 1975 – 1985 The founding of Microsoft
  • 1985 – 1994 Windows and Office
  • 1995 – 2007 Foray into the web, Winodws 95, Windows Xp, and Xbox
  • 2007 – 2011 Microsoft Azure, Windows Vista, Windows 7, and Microsoft Stores
  • 2011 – 2014 Windows 8, Xbox One, Outlook.com, and Surface devices
  • 2014 – present Windows 10, Windows 10 Mobile, Microsoft Edge and HoloLens


What is that?

Microsoft is a leading global vendor of computer software; hardware for computer, mobile and gaming systems; and cloud services. Microsoft's corporate headquarters is located in Redmond, Wash., and it has offices in more than 60 countries.

Its best known software products are the Microsoft Windows line of operating systems, the Microsoft Office suite, and the Internet Explorer and Edge web browsers.
